parameter.name: userId
parameter.description: The unique identifier of the user.

parameter.name: type
parameter.description: The type of the contact method. One of the phone, SMS and email.

parameter.name: address
parameter.description: The address of the contact depending on the type.

parameter.name: countryCode
parameter.description: The country code when the type is SMS and phone.

parameter.name: label
parameter.description: The label for identifying the contact method.

parameter.name: isSendShortEmail
parameter.description: The boolean flag indicating whether to send an abbreviated email message.
